text: Clicker 9: function evaluations for secant Suppose that every evaluation of f(x) is incredibly expensive and requires a broadcast from the moon (think, say, of computing the trajectory of a space shuttle landing on the moon), and you are hired to make sure that the number of broadcasts is minimal, using the secant method. If you have done a good job, then the overall number of broadcasts after k iterations will be Q@ k Q@ 2k Q@ 42 @ k function evaluations and k derivative evaluations @ this cannot be determined
